section.name: TomcatCon
section.p: TomcatCon is the place for all users of Tomcat to expand their Tomcat knowledge in areas such as networking, security, performance and deployment. It also offers an opportunity to discuss the current Tomcat roadmap and help inform future development.

p.i: Note: The main conference is September 25 to 27, 2018. The Tomcat track starts the day before.

subsection.name: Where
subsection.p: Montréal Marriott Chateau Champlain, Montréal, Canada, as part of ApacheCon North America 2018.

subsection.name: What
subsection.p: This is a two day track dedicated to Apache Tomcat that starts the day before the main conference.
Registration for TomcatCon is open. Registration includes access to ApacheCon North America.
